public class CPU
extends ComponentListener
implements Runnable
CPU This class handels registers, CPU clock and all Assembler-commands

Version:
0.1
Author:
Beno Kurmann, Michel Marti

REG_0
ID of Register 0 - Component
REG_1
ID of Register 1 - Component
REG_I
ID of Instruction Register - Component

CPU(AddressBus, DataBus, ControlBus)
Constructs a new CPU-Object

clock()
Process next CPU-cycle
isAuto()
Tells wether Auto-clock is activated or not
reset()
Resets all registers, Stops old CPU-thread and starts a new one
run()
Main method in this class
setAuto(boolean)
Activates Auto-clock (true) or disables Auto-clock (false)
setDataBus(DataBus)
Changes the DataBus Object
setDelay(long)
/* Set the delay between 2 clocks.
setGUI(DemoComputer)
start()
Starts a new CPU-thread
stop()
Stops CPU-thread
toggleAuto()
Toggles between Auto-clock and Manual-clock
wordChanged(Word, int, String)
Tells other Components that register has changed
